fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation, Public Health, Communication
head_office_address: Global Sepsis Alliance Equity House 4-6 School Road
eu_initiatives: Working closely with national governments and the World Health Organization to develop national plans for sepsis, implementing the demands of WHO Resolution on Sepsis, raising awareness of sepsis in the general public with the help of funded and effective campaigns.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
The GSA contacts members and their assisstants, officials or other staff of EU instituions, the GSA prepares, circulates, and communicates letters, information material and discusses papers and position papers, and the GSA also organizes events, meetings, conferences etc. to which EU officials have been invited or attended, for example a WHA Side Event in Geneva in May, or the World Sepsis Congress Spotlight: Maternal and Neonatal Sepsis'. 
The GSA works closely with the World Health Organization and national governments to establish national plans for sepsis, as well as public awareness campaigns focused on sepsis, the number one preventable cause of death worldwide.
goals__remit: Provide global leadership to reduce the worldwide burden of sepsis.
